name: Tank Defence
description:
In this game, you can try your hand alone or invite a friend to fight the forces of evil as a team! The broken tank is controlled with the left mouse button, which fires shots and destroys enemies, protecting the soldier. If your soldier is overtaken by enemies, then you lose!

Tank Defense - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a tank with the mouse and the movement of a soldier with the keyboard. The game is designed for two players who work together to resist hordes of enemies and help each other pass levels.

Control:
WASD - walking
Left Mouse Button - shooting

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Game for two
- Difficulty
